name: fc-web
author: Floating Cats Team <floatingcatsnft@gmail.com>
description: We are a team located in Nagoya, Japan. We love cats. Our goal is to build a strong community in order to help as many cats as possible.

scripts.fc-refresh: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install

dependenciesComments.//1: Packages that are under dependencies are mainly the core packages that your code will need to work.
dependenciesComments.//2: Packages like react, angular etc are some of the packages that mainly resides under “dependencies”.

devDependenciesComments.//1: Packages that are under devDependencies are mainly used for the development purposes and ignored while building the production build.
devDependenciesComments.//2: Packages like test suites, liniting, transpilers etc are some of the packages that mainly resides under “devDependencies”.
